Package part1.mailStorePack

Class MailStoreOnFile

java.lang.Object
part1.mailStorePack.MailStore
part1.mailStorePack.MailStoreOnFile
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, MailStoreInterface
public class MailStoreOnFile
extends MailStore
implements java.io.Serializable, MailStoreInterface
This class implements the MailStore Interface to store the messages in a file.
See Also:
